name: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
description: Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers' war.
keywords: evil robot,male soldier,weapons fire,helicopter gunship,helicopter crash

review.author: briancham1994
review.heading: Decent way to pass the time
review.reviewBody: Yes, this film is incredibly stupid and loud, but that's what you are getting yourself into. It's a purely entertaining popcorn blockbuster with exciting action and not much of a plot. For sure, the jokes are dumb and not much makes sense, but if you just want to pass the time, this film is a good way to do it.
